title: Sound On: Jobs Report Reaction, Taxes (Radio)
itunes:title: Sound On: Jobs Report Reaction, Taxes (Radio)
description:
Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.


Guests:

Labor Secretary Marty Walsh, Douglas Holtz-Eakin, American Action Forum President, Bloomberg Government reporter Jack Fitzpatrick and Bloomberg News White House Lead Editor, Alex Wayne.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
